programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Steve Irwin loved sea turtles. Terri and Robert continue his legacy as they transport three rescued sea turtles to Lady Elliot Island on the Great Barrier Reef - for the first time, by air. This complex mission is vital in order to help conserve these beautiful but endangered animals. While Robert and Terri take to the skies, Bindi and the team are nervously waiting for the birth of Australia Zoos first Sumatran tiger cub in three years. Richie from the rescue unit helps with a baby wallabys struggle for survival

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Tia attempts to rescue a stray, but her leg injury holds her back, and new parolee Mike struggles to balance working and parenthood

programme.desc: Marty embarks on a dangerous self-shot mission to carve a road up 300-ft cliffs. Meanwhile, Misty enlists her family to build a predator-proof coop for the chickens

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A look at TV appearances made over the years by the Mary Poppins and Sound of Music star, capturing the milestones of her life and career. Featuring interviews from the archives as well as classic clips. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: Actor Gillian Anderson talks to John Wilson about her most significant creative influences and experiences, such as her upbringing in London in the UK and Michigan in the US. She also explains how her University drama teacher Ric Murphy acted as a major influence on her early acting ambitions

programme.title: Viceroys House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, oversees the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as opposing sides clash in the face of huge change. Drama, starring Hugh Bonneville, Gillian Anderson and Manish Dayal

programme.title: The Jet Stream and Us
programme.desc: Documentary examining the influence that the jet stream - a ribbon of fast-moving air high up in the atmosphere - has on everyday weather. Here, scientists explain the effects the phenomenon has had on climate and discuss what could happen should it change its pattern of behaviour

programme.title: Talking Pictures

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Zoe Ball presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 10 July 1998. Featuring B*witched, Matthew Marsden, The Jungle Brothers, Karen Ramirez, Destinys Child, Mansun, Eagle-Eye Cherry and Billie.

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 17 July 1998. Including performances from Billie, Celine Dion and The Bee Gees, Pras Michel featuring ODB and Mya, Eagle-Eye Cherry, Five Mousse T feat Hot n Juicy, Garbage and Another Level.

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Mike Read presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 1 October 1981. Featuring The Tweets, Toyah, Altered Images, Gidea Park, The Creatures, Bad Manners, Dollar and Adam and the Ants. Also, a dance sequence by Legs and Co

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Mark Franklin and Claudia Simon present the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 1 October 1992. Featuring Stereo MCs, Crowded House, Doctor Spin, Dr Alban, Bob Marley and the Wailers, Bizarre Inc featuring Angie Brown, Status Quo and The Shamen

programme.title: Country Kings at the BBC
programme.desc: A chronological compilation of performances from the BBC archive by male country singers, ranging from the Everly Brothers and Jerry Lee Lewis to Garth Brooks and Willie Nelson. Featuring classic songs from studio shows by Glen Campbell, Charley Pride, George Hamilton IV, Kenny Rogers, Clint Black, Johnny Cash and Eric Church

programme.title: Kenny Rogers in Concert
programme.desc: Country music icon Kenny Rogers stars in a television special from 1979, recorded during a visit to England. He is joined by pop-country vocal group Dave and Sugar. First broadcast 10 January 1979

programme.title: Tammy
programme.desc: Country music star Tammy Wynette sings her favourite songs and introduces fellow Nashville star George Hamilton IV at The Maltings in Suffolk. First broadcast 24 August 1977

programme.title: The Old Grey Whistle Test
programme.sub-title: The Old Grey Whistle Test Special: Emmy Harris
programme.desc: A one-off concert by the country star and the Hot Band recorded for the Old Grey Whistle Test in 1977, including performances of Luxury Liner and Tulsa Queen. Bob Harris presents

programme.title: Emmy Harris: From a Deeper Well
programme.desc: Profile of the highly respected singer, who has spent the past 30 years building an impressive body of country music. Discovered by Gram Parsons, Harris and her former backing group the Hot Band revolutionised the genre in the 1970s and 1980s, re-interpreting it for successive generations of fans. She then went on to release Wrecking Ball, one of the most critically acclaimed albums of the 1990s. Featuring interviews with friends, colleagues and admirers including Elvis Costello, Willie Nelson and Keith Richards

programme.title: Kenny Rogers in Concert
programme.desc: Country music icon Kenny Rogers stars in a television special from 1979, recorded during a visit to England. He is joined by pop-country vocal group Dave and Sugar. First broadcast 10 January 1979

programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Janette Manrara host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: SAS: Catching the Criminals
programme.desc: Home-grown cannabis is now being farmed in the UK. Ex-SAS leader Billy Billingham and Staffordshire Police raid multiple secret cannabis labs in the Midlands

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Owain Wyn Evans almost gets lost trying to locate a flat in London. Martel Maxwell is less than amiable after viewing a quirky design feature in York, and Jacqui Joseph is equally unimpressed by a makeshift construction outside a house in Wolverhampton

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Danny Sebastian presents from Naseby Antiques Fair, Northamptonshire, where experts Kate Bliss and David Harper offer up their expertise to assist two teams as they search for profitable items to take to auction. Danny also visits the longest and steepest set of staircase locks in the UK and learns about an incredible feat of engineering

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Asher Edwards and Maxine Dwyer come to the rescue of Fatma, a grandmother struggling with arthritis. The team transform her home into a functional, comfortable and accessible space for her to enjoy

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Alan Carr takes charge tackling the first bedroom, and inspired by the romance and history of his favourite city Florence, he is determined to have a mural. However, co-renovator Amanda Holden fears his creative juices could turn into a flood. To nail his aesthetic, Alan travels to the outskirts of the Tuscan capital to meet a woman whose medieval home is decorated in rare 14th-century frescoes, and is encouraged to take down the ceiling to reveal any original features. After realising the existing furniture is riddled with woodworm, the duo head to the Gulf of Poets for inspiration

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A retired opera singer and a soon-to-be retired music teacher have decided its time to return to the UK after spending the last 25 years in the Netherlands. With Alistair Appletons help, the pair search for a new home in Somerset or Gloucestershire

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.sub-title: A Card Dealer Is Dealt a Full House
programme.desc: James Broad and Lauren Wood meet casino croupier Tony, who is struggling to clear out his late parents collections and jewellery in a bid to fund a much-needed holiday to Malta. Restorer Lauren brings an elegant but faded antique card table back to life, restoring it to its former glory. Meanwhile, auctioneer JB scours the property for likely lots, uncovering an ornate South Asian carved hardwood chair and a lovely large Japanese Kutani ware vase from the Meiji era

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show where three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle down the Answer Run towards them

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Angela Rippon

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Another mix of nationwide reports and live studio-based chat, hosted by Angellica Bell and Alex Jones

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The repercussion of recent events has consequences for all involved

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: A serial inventor aims to spark the interest of Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden, Touker Suleyman, Sara Davies and Steven Bartlett with his innovative smart stove monitor. Also in the Den are two university friends anticipating the brilliance of their rejuvenating body care brand will shine through. Plus, those behind a zesty, ginger-based alcohol alternative hope their product will pack a punch and a Bournemouth-based business owner expects the entrepreneurs to go bananas for his fruit-shaped shoe deodoriser. Presented by Evan Davis

programme.title: Sharon and Ozzy Osbourne: Coming Home
programme.desc: Chronicle of the rock star, his much-loved wife and their children Kelly and Jack, over what proved to be the final three years of the veteran performers life. After living in Los Angeles for 25 years, Ozzy makes plans to return to the UK and spend time at his Buckinghamshire country house. He faces both a diagnosis of Parkinsons and a series of back injuries that make walking difficult - but nevertheless plans to put on a final concert in his home city of Birmingham, that goes ahead despite his ailing health

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers reviews the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the topical debate, inviting a panel of politicians and other guests in Belfast to answer questions from an invited audience on subjects that have made the headlines over the past week

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics

programme.title: SAS: Catching the Criminals
programme.desc: Greater Manchester Police make multiple raids on suspected organised crime gangs. Ex-SAS leader Billy Billingham joins the teams searching for ill-gotten gains

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts, Dion Dublin and Martel Maxwell follow the progress of holiday lets in Blackpool and Llanfynydd and a semi-detached house in Wolverhampton, finding out what the new owners have done with the properties

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In the beautiful surroundings of Ardingly Antiques Fair in West Sussex, the red and blue teams cut a dash as they make their way around the bountiful stalls on the hunt for profit. In red, Heathrow Airport colleagues Keeley and Sohesh buckle up to take on the blue team, teachers Becca and Mike, under the watchful eye of experts Danny Sebastian and Kate Bliss. Presenter Natasha Raskin Sharp observes the contest and also meets dapper young period tailor Zack Pinsent from Brighton, who at the age of 14 was inspired to begin dressing like a Regency gent every day

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Great Slaughter is buzzing with excitement for the annual talent show, which has a huge cash prize and a celebrity judge. However, the excitement turns to panic when an egotistical magician is killed during his act. Rather than an accident, Sister Boniface suspects murder. John Thomson guest stars, with Lorna Watson

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Armed with a healthy budget of £450,000, Jules Hudson property shops with a couple wanting to make a permanent move from Kent to the scenic East Riding of Yorkshire. They are in search of a house with space for a burgeoning catering business. Jules also heads to Bridlington where he tests his sea legs in a traditional fishing boat unique to the area

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.sub-title: Luxury Watches and a Rare Teddy Get Rehomed
programme.desc: Auctioneer James Broad and restorer JJ Chalmers help a Wolverhampton couple with a passion for collecting. JB falls in love with some valuable wristwatches, and JJ resists temptation when he restores a drinks cabinet to its former glory

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show where three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle down the Answer Run towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face the Final Run and earn the opportunity to take home their cash prize

programme.title: Pointless

programme.title: Party Political Broadcast
programme.sub-title: 03/10/2025 - The Social Democratic and Labour Party
programme.desc: By the Social Democratic and Labour Party

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo and Angellica Bell host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Auctioneer Izzie Balmer and restoration expert Saf Fakir help best friends Sally and Lynn fund a much-needed holiday. Izzie discovers a treasure trove of jewellery, and hidden under a bed, a beautiful 19th-century French mantelpiece clock. Meanwhile, Saf uses his skills to revive a mid-century draw-leaf table. He also uses some unconventional methods to restore a brass statue to its former glory

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles leads a team of experts in Leicester helping seven-year-old Isla, a bright and determined little girl who dreams of living more independently in her own home. Born with a rare genetic condition, Isla requires a fully bespoke environment - from accessible furniture to specially designed living spaces. However, creating a home that supports her now and into the future is no small feat. With limited space and a long list of bespoke adaptations, the team members face one of their biggest logistical and emotional challenges yet

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell fronts the satirical current affairs quiz, as it returns for its 70th run. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton are joined by actress Sheila Hancock and actor and comedian Miles Jupp to poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: The broadcaster reintegrates into life in Britain after a year working in Saudi Arabia, dedicating his efforts into a series of issues-led films. Leaving behind a lucrative career voicing radio commercials, Alan makes a bravely personal and personally brave return to TV to make Britains first ever documentary about mental health. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan, with Felicity Montagu and Tim Key

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host welcomes global music star Taylor Swift, inviting her to discuss her album The Life of a Showgirl. Also appearing are Oscar-winner Cillian Murphy, who is playing the head teacher in reform school drama Steve and actors Greta Lee and Jodie Turner-Smith, who are appearing together in sci-fi reboot Tron: Ares. Plus, Domhnall Gleeson talks about his new comedy role in The Office spin-off The Paper and Lewis Capaldi performs Something in the Heavens

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens are tasked to channel the spirit of Claudia Winkleman as they play their very own version of The Traitors. Next, they take on one of Drag Races toughest challenges - the Design Challenge - but, of course, theres a twist. The queens must rumble in the jumble sale as theyre tasked with creating looks from leftover items from Drag Race UKs previous series. Supermodel-turned-comedy star Michelle de Swarte joins the judging panel alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton

programme.title: Alan Partridge: Alpha Papa
programme.desc: The hapless local radio DJ ends up in the centre of a siege when colleague Pat Farrell gets fired by the stations new owners, only to respond by returning to the studio with a shotgun and taking hostages. The police enlist Alans aid as a negotiator, giving him the chance to revive his own flagging public profile. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan, Colm Meaney and Felicity Montagu

programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Wily Winston Churchill Special
programme.desc: Charting the life of the former British prime minister, including his time as a soldier in India and his part in the Allies victory in the Second World War. Jim Howick stars

programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan quizzes Gareth Malone, Brian McFadden, Sam Thompson, Sindhu Vee, Desiree Burch, Lee Mead, Kiri Pritchard-McLean and Lauren Steadman to win £50,000 for charity

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts this game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. Taking part this week are friends Lou and Jude from Grimsby, cousins Sibtain and Umar from London and Nottingham, and friends Steph and Jo from Barry

The queens must rumble in the jumble sale as theyre tasked with creating looks from leftover items from Drag Race UKs previous series. Supermodel-turned-comedy star Michelle de Swarte joins the judging panel alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. However, all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance. Mark Gatiss guest stars, with Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Juice

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Journalist Tir Dhondy investigates the disappearance of Sarm Heslop, who went missing from a luxury Caribbean charter yacht in 2021. Tire retraces Sarms last known movements and tracks down two boat captains whose vessels were moored near the yacht she vanished from. Also, she gets to question Ryan Banes, Sarms boyfriend, account of what happened what happened through his lawyer David Cattie

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm

However, United started the current campaign brightly and will be hopeful of a more positive result in front of their own fans this time around

programme.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark

Bowie, looking for love in all the wrong places, joins Dom on his first mandate with Tim at a microbrewery, where he spills the beans on the inspiration behind his dads friend-finding app. Later, an awkward run-in with Angie and Edith results in the talk Dom and Angie had been putting off. programme.desc: ...Lemmings/Remote Control/The Bear and the Butterfly/Get Off My Tennis Shoes/Babysitting/Bear Under Lock And Key/Lemming Blues/Snow Lemmings => An old metal box found by chance in a recess of a cliff brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. / How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry with a fun experiment box? / Grizzys TV remote is stolen and stored high up in a tree. / Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to his beloved she bear. / The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. / Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! / Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger’s brand new and apparently burglar proof safe. / Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. / On a very hot day an ice cream commercial awakes the desire of Grizzy.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: A day with Starmush/The Mysterious Seepod/The Disappearing Mushler/Bouncing Back/Morel in the Dark
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is. / Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. / Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone. / Mush-Mush invents a new game called Fruity Bounce. / When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Staff Of Wisdom/Let It Bee/Bird Call/The Hero Trap
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. / Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers – a job that takes time and care. / Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. / The Mushlets love Mush-Mush’s heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he can’t back out.

programme.desc: Award-winning hairdresser Charlotte tells us why she loves using her afro comb to style people’s hair.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Meagaidh the Border Collie is a search and rescue dog who works with her owner Tom. Her supernose follows scents and smells like clues, so they can rescue people who need their help. Meagaidh and Tom are visiting a school to show the children how a search and rescue dog works. They demonstrate some of their equipment, including Meagaidhs special doggy goggles, which she wears to keep the wind and dust out of her eyes when shes in the helicopter. Tom demonstrates how Meagaidh is lowered from the helicopter all the way down to the ground using a special harness. They also demonstrate a practice rescue mission, playing hide-and-seek with the children to show them how Meagaidhs supernose can follows scents and smells like clues. But when the school cook goes missing with the childrens cheese sandwiches, Meagaidh has to use her supernose for real. Can she help Tom track down the cook and rescue the childrens lunches?

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.sub-title: Metal Recycling Centre and Road Sign
programme.desc: Today Maddie is learning about metal, and how it can be recycled and used again. Maddie visits a recycling centre where they recycle metal from old cars. She uses her special cameras to help us see how the gigantic crab cranes pick up, move and crush the cars into small pieces

programme.title: Yakka Dee!
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ‘digger and we go on a whirlwind word adventure

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Numberblocks play an exciting game of bounceball and its the Even Tops versus the Odd Blocks. Learn about odd and even numbers with the Numberblocks

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: CH goes up against SH in the Alphablocks Games. This episode features the ch and sh digraphs and the words shop, chop, chip, shin, chin, shed, mash, cash and sash

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Again asks Arty to create stripy patterns for the front of his bouncy castle. With Splat Red, Splat Yellow and Splat Blue helping out, everyone is sure this is possible

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Green is surprised when Black and White arrive in her forest. Learn about light and dark colours with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Stripes and Toad see a beautiful sunrise and decide to write a song about it together. But Stripes wants the song to be rocky, while Toad wants it to be slower

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Down on the river, Justin and his friends learn to paddle a bell boat and have a sing song. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble joins Fisherman Tumble by the water as they go duck spotting

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies do running races and they each have a chance to win. In Tummy Tales, two sisters watch their father running in a race

programme.title: Andys Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: When the museums prized prehistoric tumbleweed goes missing, Andy Day heads back 85 million years in time to try and find some more. During his search he helps a mother dinosaur protect her nest

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Dougs mum, Zoe, brings surprises for the Brooklyn-Bells, but Waffle is sad because Doug is going to stay with her for a few days. Mrs Hobbs watches Waffle with new spy equipment

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Topsy wakes up in the hospital feeling much better and gets dressed for the first time since her operation. Later, she meets a girl called Molly and Grandma visits

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

programme.title: The Game Catchers

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Tweak and Bud are stranded on a floating island made of papyrus reeds

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When the buggy gets a flat tyre, Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard are stranded. Big Lizard’s playful nature helps reveal a creative solution to their problem.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea is tricked by lots of Supertatoes who appear all over the supermarket.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Norrie is upset when a leaf falls from a tree, and Roly finds an acorn stuck to his bottom, prompting the Squirrels to search for more to share out

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Wriggly Worms

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops

programme.desc: Sheldon bids an emotional goodbye to Fun with Flags as he and Amy record the final instalment of the internet show. Leonard, Howard and Raj clear out the office of a recently deceased professor and take a peek at his research. Guest starring LeVar Burton

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: While the squad attends a funeral in Los Angeles, Captain Holt learns that he is in the running for his dream job: Commissioner of the NYPD. however, after they miss their return flight to New York, Peralta must find a way to get Holt back in time for his interview. Santiago tries to convince everyone that she can be laid back, Jeffords panics about losing his first-class flight, and Boyle pries into Diazs personal life

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Diaz begs Peralta to help her break some big news to her parents, but her plan is thrown off track when Mr and Mrs Diaz wrongly assume that their daughter and her colleague are dating. The squad suffers internet problems after the Cyber Crimes Unit move into the office downstairs

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer agrees to a request from Mel Gibson to help re-edit his latest film, a remake of the James Stewart classic Mr Smith Goes to Washington - and shocks the studio executives by adding a lot more action scenes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is placed on experimental medication in a bid to control his disruptive behaviour - but it proves to have unfortunate paranoia-inducing side-effects, which soon spiral out of control. Featuring the guest voice of baseball star Mark McGwire

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The second dinner party serves up romantic confessions for some, but one bride struggles to find the support and validation shes looking for from her husband, leaving her questioning her marriage

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tyre during Leonards surprise bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Meanwhile, the girls finally force Penny to break the news to her family that she has eloped with Leonard. Keith Carradine guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard announce that they are moving in together, prompting Sheldon to revisit 2003, a much simpler time before he had met either of them. Howard and Raj form a band to play at the comic-book store, only to fall out over musical differences

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Glamorous Hollywood star Sara Sloane visits Springfield and becomes infatuated with Ned Flanders, who finds himself asking Homer for dating advice. Featuring the voices of Helen Fielding and Marisa Tomei

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: With changes afoot at Springfields airport, Bart persuades Krusty to run for Congress so he can redirect the flight path of planes passing over the Simpson home. However, he soon alters his policies once elected

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Grandfather
programme.desc: After ducking out of a bonding session with Grampa, a guilt-ridden Homer vows to make it up to his father by granting him a wish. The old man decides to visit Ireland and drop in on his favourite pub from his army days. Upon arrival, the pair discover the bar is a shadow of its former self, and agree to buy the business and turn its fortunes around

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge signs Homer and Bart up on a father-son bonding ocean voyage in a bid to heal their troubled relationship, and while the pair are away takes over Homers fantasy football league. Animation, featuring the voice of Nick Offerman (Parks and Recreation)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: The first guests in the 20th series get off to a rocky start when 39-year-old Craig drops the bombshell that he has three children - all with different mothers. Avid gamer Olivia feels she needs to play down her interests when on dates, and hopes to meet someone who will accept them, while dog lover Billy is troubled to discover her date has tattoos of 40 peoples names

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A recently divorced bookshop owner finds love with a glamorous Hollywood film star, but ends up the focus of unwanted media interest - which makes maintaining a relationship a tricky proposition. Romantic comedy written by Richard Curtis, starring Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Rhys Ifans, Emma Chambers, James Dreyfus and Gina McKee

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents the dating show in which two singletons choose a date from six naked people - and first up is 23-year-old Nameya from Bristol. Nameya is bisexual and hopes to find her perfect package in either a sexy guy or her first ever girlfriend. Next up is 35-year-old Dan from Bolton. Dan loves a fairy-tale but will her very own Prince Charming be standing behind one of the screens?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts the show in which six potential dates bare all bit by bit in a bid to prove they are the one. She is joined by 28-year-old nature lover Oliver from Norwich, who has never had a girlfriend, and 48-year-old building boss Claire from Manchester. They will both choose a date after seeing what their potential partners have to offer on a purely physical level. But will they prove to be a good match?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions to Killing Eve, Netflix show Too Hot to Handle, The Yorkshire Vet, The Andrew Marr Show interview with Michael Gove, Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins, and BBC news coverage of face masks

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: Dylan tries his luck with some attractive guests, but worries his job might be in danger if he pushes too far

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Strong Arms of the Ma
programme.desc: Marge is mugged at the supermarket and develops a fear of venturing outdoors - until she starts a fitness regimen with Homers old weights and develops muscles guaranteed to deter any would-be assailant

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The boys want to become more sporty, so Barry Kripke leads them in a fencing lesson, while Penny, Amy and Bernadette help Stuart, who wants to attract more female customers to the comic-book store

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the middle of a nationwide shortage of liquid helium, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to obtain the supplies they need in order to prove a scientific theory before a rival team of researchers can beat them to it. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app onto Amys phone in order to find her a new boyfriend

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay shows a bit of favouritism when he and Gloria must deal with Joes inappropriate Valentine gift-giving and Mannys dating indecisiveness, while Cam and Mitch try to get Lily, Haley and Sal to stand up to the men in their lives, but things dont turn out as planned

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Feeling empowered after his successful DIY project, Phil convinces Jay to invest in a property that hes always wanted to develop. Meanwhile, Claires newfound love of cooking Sunday dinners hasnt been as successful as she thinks

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: CID officers organise a stakeout to trap a burglar who has escaped from custody

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: A sailor learns his involvement in smuggling has made him the chief suspect in a murder case, and reluctantly goes on the run. Ealing thriller, starring Bonar Colleano, Susan Shaw, Renee Asherson and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: Nothing But the Best
programme.desc: An ambitious estate agent hires a seedy old Etonian to groom him in the ways of the upper class - but as his status grows, so does his overwhelming desire for money and power. Black comedy, starring Alan Bates, Denholm Elliott, Harry Andrews and Millicent Martin

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: Two elderly brothers each stand to inherit a fortune if the other dies first - but one of them is not prepared to leave anything to chance, and begins a series of disastrous attempts on his unsuspecting siblings life. However, when one of the pair appears to have really died, his nephews conspire to cover it up. Black comedy, with John Mills, Ralph Richardson, Michael Caine, Peter Cook and Dudley Moore

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill

programme.title: Dantes Peak
programme.desc: A vulcanologists suspicions that a long-dormant volcano is about to erupt turn out to be true, prompting him to race against time to save the community standing in its way - and clash with local government officials weighing his predictions against the loss in tourism revenue. Disaster movie, starring Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Elizabeth Hoffman and Charles Hallahan

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: When a murder victim is discovered on the stage of the Ambassadors Theatre in Londons glittering West End, world-weary Inspector Stoppard and eager-to-please rookie Constable Stalker arrive to solve the case. Everyone is a suspect including the cast, crew and ushers. Mystery comedy set during the original 1950s production of The Mousetrap, starring Sam Rockwell and Saoirse Ronan

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: Wealthy crime novelist Harlan Thrombey invites his kin to an 85th birthday party at his mansion, but festivities are cut short by arguments. When the writer apparently commits suicide, Detective Lieutenant Elliott and Trooper Wagner attend the scene, while private detective Benoit Blanc hovers in the background, closely observing family members. Writer/director Rian Johnsons comedy crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Chris Evans and Ana de Armas

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: President Franklin Roosevelt prepares to welcome the king and queen of Britain to his New York country estate in 1939. While the visiting royals hope to persuade the US to side with them in the coming Second World War, their host is more concerned with pursuing a secret affair with a distant cousin. Drama, starring Bill Murray, Laura Linney, Samuel West and Olivia Colman

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: A knight returning home from fighting in the Wars of the Roses returns home to discover his father has been murdered. A family friend fighting for the other side has been blamed for the crime, but the knight tries to prove his wicked uncle is responsible. Swashbuckling adventure based on Robert Louis Stevensons novel, starring Louis Hayward and Janet Blair

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: A Navy captain reluctantly takes command of an old US destroyer during the Second World War and struggles with a crew who do not respect his authority. However, the prospect of facing the mighty German force brings much-needed unity. Adventure, starring Trevor Howard, Richard Attenborough, Bernard Lee, Sonny Tufts and James Donald

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Biopic of Winston Churchill, following the future prime ministers formative years. While working as a journalist, he travels to Africa to report on the Boer Wars, an assignment that leads to his incarceration in a prison camp. He escapes from captivity and returns to England to begin a political career. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Simon Ward, Anthony Hopkins, Anne Bancroft and Robert Shaw

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: A foppish royalist nobleman leads a double life as a Roundhead-baiting highwayman. However, after Cromwells final victory at the battle of Worcester, the dashing hero has to smuggle the son of Charles I to safety in France. Swashbuckling adventure, starring George Baker, Sylvia Syms, Marius Goring, John Le Mesurier and Patrick Troughton

programme.title: Daddys Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wifes two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Trailblazer Air pilot Captain Brodie Torrance takes flight with handcuffed prisoner Louis Gaspare on board. A direct lightning strike forces Torrance and co-pilot Dele to emergency land on a remote island under the control of militia leader Junmar. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler and Mike Colter

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: Faded television actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double Cliff Booth strive to hang on to their careers during the final years of Hollywoods Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles. As they navigate a changing film industry they barely recognise any more, they are drawn into the orbit of both ill-fated rising star Sharon Tate, and Charles Manson and his cult of zealous followers. Drama from director Quentin Tarantino, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt, Margot Robbie, Timothy Olyphant and Al Pacino

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: A Scottish teenager travels to America at the end of the 19th century. He travels across the frontier in the hope of being reunited with the woman he loves, aided in his travels by a mysterious drifter and stalked through the wilderness by an outlaw. Western, starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender

Festive drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure in a dual role, with Eion Bailey

Mystery drama, starring Lori Loughlin

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Lexi is shocked by the revelation that her older sister is actually her mother - and is so distraught she decides to leave the village. Zak enlists Duke to help him prepare for the bare-knuckle bout.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Fiz learns her bike has been vandalised and assumes Kirk is the culprit, so sets out to confront her ex-boyfriend. Claire is unsettled by a silent phonecall.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Isobel suggests using Downton as a place of convalescence following a distressing incident at the village hospital. Shell-shocked new valet Lang arrives as William gets his call-up papers, and Carson strives to keep standards high, but suffers a panic attack in front of the family. Lady Rosamund is eager to unearth Lavinia and Carlisles secret after overhearing them arguing, and romance blossoms for both Edith and Mary. Costume drama, starring Jim Carter, Samantha Bond and Cal Macaninch

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Obsessive-compulsive Mrs Tishell returns to the village, but her affection for Martin quickly disappears when he refuses to pass her fit for work. As if he didnt have enough on his plate, the grumpy doctor must also face his fear of blood when tests show that Lorna has a high level of ferritin, which is placing a strain on her heart and liver. Meanwhile, PC Penhale hopes to be selected for an elite police squad by taking part in a survival training course - but ends up shooting himself in the foot

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A dispute between a retired teacher and a surly farmer gets out of hand, romance is in the air as PC Bellamy escorts Gina to a club opening night, and Greengrass gets a bombshell - literally. Guest starring Angela Thorne and Duncan Preston

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike and Jackie suffer a terrifying ordeal at the hands of a stalker out for revenge, and David holds the fort while Greengrass and Bernie help to arrange a funeral with a difference. Rural drama, starring Jason Durr, Fiona Dolman and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: The detective is drawn into the strange murder of eminent art historian Professor Van Haren, who was really a former high-ranking Nazi hired by MI5 due to his expert knowledge of Soviet intelligence. Meanwhile, as Sams husband Adam embarks on a busy career as an MP, she worries whether she will be able to share some big news with him. Crime drama set in the 1940s, starring Michael Kitchen and Honeysuckle Weeks, with Tamzin Outhwaite and Rupert Vansittart

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: Michael Kitchen returns to the role of Christopher Foyle, senior intelligence officer for MI5, in the first of three films. Foyle is drawn into the world of corrupt Nazi businessmen when a university professor is found murdered in a London park. When it transpires the victim was working as a translator in Nuremberg, the detective realises there are powerful people trying to conceal secrets from the Second World War. Meanwhile, Sam (Honeysuckle Weeks) volunteers for a risky undercover job, despite being pregnant. Guest stars include John Mahoney (Frasier), Jaime Winstone (Mad Dogs) and Nigel Lindsay (Four Lions)

programme.title: Wire in the Blood

Starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris

programme.desc: A local church suffers a series of thefts and the finger of suspicion seems to point to the vicarage, of all places. Meanwhile, Greengrasss hopes of winning a dog show take a knock when his pedigree contestant goes missing. Rural drama, starring Jason Durr and Bill Maynard

programme.desc: A former MPs lascivious past catches up with him just as he is planning a comfortable retirement, and Greengrass makes his presence felt at the village bonfire party as only he knows how. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, William Russell and Joanna David

programme.desc: The son of a high-profile Jewish businessman is attacked in the grounds of a university, leaving Foyle to consider the possibility that the attack was racially motivated. Meanwhile, in London, tensions mount as charismatic right-wing leader Guy Spencer is released from prison. But is he being set up to take the spotlight off a dangerous espionage operation involving MI6? Elsewhere, Sam becomes acutely aware of the impact of the war on Adams constituents as she encounters a young boy suffering from whooping cough. Michael Kitchen stars in the 1940s-set crime drama, with Honeysuckle Weeks and Daniel Weyman

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: The last-ever episode. When his colleague Hilda Pierce is targeted by an assassin outside MI5, Foyle must re-examine her top-secret role during the war. He suspects the shooting could be connected to the hunt for a traitor within the Special Operations Executive who may have been behind the deaths of nine agents in France. Fantasy adventure, with Jason Momoa, Stephen Lang, Ron Perlman and Rose McGowan

programme.desc: Samantha OHara, team leader of a mercenary squad, has to rescue hostages from their captors in a remote part of Africa. Spaghetti Western, starring James Coburn and Telly Savalas

She flees into the forest with the thugs in hot pursuit, and uses the contents of her toolbox to fight for her life. Thriller, starring Kim Basinger, Lukas Haas and Craig Sheffer.

programme.desc: A look at all the latest movies and series to view this month

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: BandB owners in France juggle a busy diary with the pressures of parenthood. In Spain, a microbrewery ramps up promotion, and a couple in France create face cream from snail slime

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A microbrewery on the Spanish coast bags a valuable new client, while in France, BandB owners work hard to complete work on their breakfast terrace

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: DIY novice Trish takes on the challenge of rebuilding a dilapidated bridge that sits over a fast-flowing stream and Tim at Chateau du Puits Es Pratx attempts to convert an old wine barrel into a unique dining space ahead of the upcoming wedding season. Andrea and David make a final push in their quest for their perfect home

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: New chateau owners Terry and Ashley uncover a nasty surprise behind their wood panelling and Tim and Sasha disagree on the lighting for their converted wine barrel dining space. Belinda and Lee at Chateau Mareuil plan a coronation-themed murder mystery fit for a king

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition gets under way at Acqua Beach in Weymouth, where Charlotte Weaver and her best friend Lucy Falkingham hope their quirky design and decor makes them stand out from the crowd. But Stephen thinks the price is far from right and Derek and Lynne take exception to the decoration. During an afternoon of sand sculpting, things get personal for Adam and his partner Susan Lewes, then at dinner Derek upsets Charlotte with his comments on her design choices

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the competition is to Langmead Guest House in Ramsgate, where owners Derek and Lynne Love are all about keeping it simple. Adam and Susan are not blown away by the beige interior while Charlotte and Lucy are horrified to discover moths in the bed. During an afternoon playing crazy golf with a twist, simmering tension is revealed between Charlotte and Stephen, which erupts at dinner

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to the Big Green Bus in Lewes, where carpenter Adam Collier-Woods and his girlfriend Susan Lerski run an unconventional BandB on a converted double-decker bus. On arrival, all the guests are shocked to discover where theyll be sleeping, and during an afternoon foraging for wild garlic, professional chef Stephen plays a trick on the group as Charlotte and Lucy reveal their competitive side

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The last visit of the week is to the Pheasant hotel in Brill, Buckinghamshire, where professional chef Stephen Orr hopes his top-level place will win the day. On arrival, Adam and Susan are bowled over by the beautiful views and all the guests are surprised by the quality of the rooms. However, on closer inspection, Charlotte and Lucy are unimpressed by dust and a cobweb

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet for the final time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. Stephen from the Pheasant tries to avoid a grilling by explaining his motives for pulling the wool over the groups eyes

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Kent to rescue a much-loved 1973 Dennis fire engine. It used to belong to New Romney station, where firefighter Tony cherished it. He later bought it to restore and to use for charity fundraising. Alas, Tony died from cancer and never completed the restoration and his colleagues have nominated his son James for the Car S.O.S treatment, so that he can see his fathers wishes come true

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Manchester to rescue a Citroen HY van, which 19-year-old Darcie and her mother Alison bought so that they could start a mobile catering business. Sadly, the dream was shattered when Alison was killed in the Manchester Arena bombing in 2017. Former England footballers Bryan Robson and Wes Brown join in to help restore the fortunes of a family torn apart by tragic events

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are house-hunting in Croydon, with Kirstie helping friends Joe, Will and Joe get their feet on the property ladder in London. Meanwhile, Phil takes on the challenge of searching for an affordable property with the space to start a family for newlyweds Leon and Cherrelle

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are in Surrey, where space is a key requirement for their house-hunting families. Elise and Elliot have already seen the house they love but its way over budget, leaving Kirstie the tricky task of finding something cheaper that matches their dream home. Phil Spencer is with Kim and Ralph, who, along with their two children under five, are bursting out of Kims two-bedroom starter flat. They desperately want a taste of the space they grew up with in Zimbabwe - but close to their extended family in Horley

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Michael Butcher and Phil Palmer want to bring a touch of urban glamour to their new home at Christmas Farm near Newbury, Berkshire, by creating a modern farmhouse that combines an open-plan party pad with functional spaces below. As the builders set to work on the handcrafted flint exterior, complete with a vast trapezoid window, the pair juggle construction with farming the land, and in an attempt to make the project work financially, they set up a microbrewery in the barn. Kevin McCloud follows their progress

programme.title: Night Coppers
programme.desc: Annie and Jack get more than they bargained for when they try to move on some drunken revellers who have been ejected from a bar. Manny carries out a welfare check after police receive a concerned call from an ex-partner. And Fran and Matt attend a suspected spikinafter receiving reports that a woman has collapsed inside a pub

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Tino is rushed into resus with memory problems after slumping over her desk at school. Consultant Liz has difficulty making a diagnosis, suspecting the girl may have a viral infection that causes a swelling of the brain. A woman with a history of anxiety attacks requires a scan after being brought in suffering from numbness down her left side, and an 11-year-old boy is treated for a broken leg after being knocked down by a car

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A busy night shift sees a series of men admitted with various problems. Father-of-six Stacey is experiencing breathing difficulties, but his demanding attitude appears to mask a vulnerability. Twenty-year-old Sam is brought in after being attacked outside a nightclub and has possible injuries to the neck and spine. He is nervous because his father died at the hospital and, with a broken nose, is worried he may have lost his looks. Henry has an electricians exam the following morning but has been hiccuping for three days. Registrar Faheem is determined to diagnose the problem and get him well in time

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics treat a man who has been stabbed in the leg and the head, only to discover he had already overdosed on heroin prior to receiving his injuries. Paramedics also treat a man struggling to breathe after a triple heart bypass operation, a woman whose rare genetic condition causes her to have seizures, and a man with severe chest pains who has recently had treatment for a heart complaint

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Tino is rushed into resus with memory problems after slumping over her desk at school. Consultant Liz has difficulty making a diagnosis, suspecting the girl may have a viral infection that causes a swelling of the brain. A woman with a history of anxiety attacks requires a scan after being brought in suffering from numbness down her left side, and an 11-year-old boy is treated for a broken leg after being knocked down by a car

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A busy night shift sees a series of men admitted with various problems. Father-of-six Stacey is experiencing breathing difficulties, but his demanding attitude appears to mask a vulnerability. Twenty-year-old Sam is brought in after being attacked outside a nightclub and has possible injuries to the neck and spine. He is nervous because his father died at the hospital and, with a broken nose, is worried he may have lost his looks. Henry has an electricians exam the following morning but has been hiccuping for three days. Registrar Faheem is determined to diagnose the problem and get him well in time

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Kate Quilton visits a farm in Cornwall to get to the bottom of the flower element in a in cauliflower. Helen Lawal is in Spain to find out what makes lemon juice last so long, while Matt Tebbutt gets the beers in at a Worksop brewery, as he explores what the term bottle conditioned actually means

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A drive for new custom pays off for a microbrewery in Spain, a weaving business launches in Portugal and a couple in Andalucia aim to make money from their love of crafting

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A weaver in Portugal juggles teaching with preparing for her first exhibition, while in Andalucía, owners of a BandB establishment host a trial weekend to see whether they have a viable business. Reality series following Brits as they launch new businesses across France, Spain, Italy and Portugal

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At the Château de Brives, Sarah and George are getting the party started, as they transform two enormous barns into a nightclub and a lounge for their wedding business. In Normandy, Terry and Ashley battle with nature, as they try to get their garden - which has been abandoned for 100 years - under control. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At the Château de Lalacelle, Terry and Ashley are up against a brick wall as they start to bring their garden back to life in an attempt to create a setting for their own wedding. In western France, Sarah and George put a chef through his paces as they hunt for the perfect wedding caterer, while at the Château de Bourneau, Erin and JB welcome a different type of guest, as they build an insect hotel to increase biodiversity. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first visit of the week is to the Miners Arms in Nenthead, Cumbria, where sisters Alison Baker and Lynda Clark hope that their eco credentials will impress their guests. However, brothers Andrew and James Widdas have to face their fear of shared bathrooms. The group get crafty by upcycling old rubbish, allowing Nigel and Pok U Regan to show off some hidden talents. At dinner, Kev Argent and Tor Johnson realise theres stiff competition from their fellow greenies. In the morning, Alison and Lynda face some tough feedback over facilities

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Brothers Andrew and James Widdas aim to provide boutique on a budget at the Rose and Crown in Edgworth, near Bolton, but they only have eight months of experience, and BandB veterans Alison and Lynda are quick to find fault. During an afternoon of decorating gingerbread houses, Pok U and Nigel are accused of trying to bribe the hosts, and as the concept of boutique is shot down over dinner, there are simmering tensions. In the morning, Kev and Tor wonder whether anyone can challenge professional chef Andrews breakfast spread, and Andrew and James struggle with some of their feedback

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Nigel and Pok U Regan cultivate an east-meets-west atmosphere at their BandB and Cantonese restaurant, the Bingham Townhouse in Nottinghamshire. Their guests arent all happy when they arrive, with Andrew and James unsure about sleeping in single beds. Kev and Tors focus and meditation skills are tested when the group are challenged to an archery competition. Alison and Lynda are staggered when they find out that Nigel bought the BandB on a whim, and have a bad taste in their mouths when he calls them sweet and sour. At breakfast, Nigel struggles to run a smooth service

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: At Float by Boat near Rugby, partners Kev Argent and Tor Johnson run mindfulness breaks from their narrowboat, Spirited Away. Alison and Lynda arent keen on the tiny shared bathroom, tight space and curtained-off bunks, and Andrew and James fret over communal living. Theres tension following Nigel and Pok Us feedback, so Kev and Tor try to unite their shipmates with group meditation. At breakfast, questions are raised over the confused branding, and at feedback time all of the guests facilities scores leave Kev and Tor speechless

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet for the last time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. Mike and Neal from the Highlands Pub challenge the comments that they were considered dirty and lacking in facilities, while Sean and Kathryn from the White House are left smarting after suffering large underpayments for what they think are minor issues. Eventually, the winner is finally revealed

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw head to Stockport to take on a 1994 Vauxhall Cavalier Turbo owned by Darren, who is unable to move from the neck down after an accident. With the car gathering dust on the drive, Darrens friends are hoping Fuzz and Tim can convert it to allow him to be a passenger and satisfy his need for speed again

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend take on their 100th motor - a 1978 MGB GT, their first electric conversion. The car used to belong to family man Jeff. When Jeff died, he left his unfinished MG project to his daughter Caroline, who promised her father she would complete the restoration. Can the team help Caroline fulfil her fathers dying wish?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two young couples who were struggling to take their first step onto the property ladder. He was in Leeds with Charlie and Hayley, who had been searching fruitlessly for nine months, unable to make a decision for fear of making the wrong one. In south-east London, Nicki and Rob wanted somewhere big enough to start a family when Kirstie and Phil suggested an unusual solution. How are both couples getting on now?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Leigh Osborne and Graham Voce want to convert and extend a landmark 150-year-old water tower in Kennington, south London, into a luxury home. Grade II-listed, derelict and with 6ft-thick walls, its a huge challenge for the pair, who also plan to build two structures at the base - a lift shaft connected by a series of glass tunnels, and a modern living space. The result will be a four-bedroom property over nine floors, complete with a room at the top offering spectacular 360-degree views across the capital. Presented by Kevin McCloud

programme.title: The Wall

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughters safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyns death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: Five years after the events in Salt Lake City, a now 19-year-old Ellie makes a discovery while on patrol with her best friend Dina. Back in Jackson Hole, Joel seeks help to mend his relationship with Ellie. The return of the post-apocalyptic drama, starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As a storm brews in the mountains, the residents of Jackson Hole prepare for the worst amid increased sightings of infected. Meanwhile, Abby weighs up her options

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Christopher gets off to a bad start with Patsy, Meadow contemplates taking a year off college to travel around Europe and Tony warns Janice about her new love. Meanwhile, there are problems on the horizon at the Newark construction site and Adriana abruptly ends her friendship with Danielle. Crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: Dexter fights for his life in the woods, leading to a confrontation in an abandoned summer camp. Harrison finds himself torn between two father figures

programme.title: Banshee
programme.sub-title: Half Deaf Is Better Than All Dead
programme.desc: Hood risks a return trip to prison by stealing a painting from a museum in Harrisburg, but its a far from smooth operation and he has to call on some old friends for help. Back in Banshee, evidence puts Proctor at the scene of a murder, while the Moody brothers attempt to dish out their own brand of justice

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon enlists the help of an unexpected ally, Daenerys makes a difficult decision in Mereen, Brienne searches for Sansa, and Theon remains under Ramsays control

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul comes to see Gina following his fathers funeral, still in a state of shock and bewilderment that he learned more about his parent from the service than he ever did from knowing him. However, as Gina tries to get him to examine his feelings more closely, he becomes increasingly evasive

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Everyday life at Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, where the members of staff try to tactfully deal with the whims of their employer, baronet Humphry Wakefield, as the estate prepares to welcome a band of ghost-hunting tourists. Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores the history of Bristol, beginning by learning a grisly secret at the docks before meeting Mercury Prize-winning musician Roni Size to discuss life in the St Pauls and Stokes Croft areas of the city. He also explores the district of Clifton and visits a speakeasy-style bar

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky tries to prepare Margaret for the worst as she panics about the consequences of her sins - while federal prosecutor Esther Randolph gets ready to make her move. Jimmy reminisces about his days at university, Mickey Doyle is annoyed at having to share the profits of his bootlegging, and Van Aldens chequered past returns to haunt him. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky prepares for his trial, and receives an unexpected boost when his estranged protege Jimmy decides to reach out to him. However, Margaret has received an offer from Esther Randolph that could change both her life and Nuckys for ever. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Kelly Macdonald and Michael Pitt

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Perry attempts to negotiate with the DA as the Gallardos trial nears, while Rafael and Mateo recount the real-life consequences of the McCutcheons Los Angeles expansion. The pursuit of a lead lands Paul in danger and Perry makes a convincing demonstration.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Perry receives important information from Holcomb, while Della interrogates Councilman Taylor and - armed with incriminating evidence - tries to change the course of the case

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena vows to stay ahead of Lila academically and romantically. Meanwhile, Stefano Carracci invites Elena, Lila and their families over for New Years Eve. In Italian

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky hosts a New Years Eve party to see in 1923, but makes an enemy of whiskey-loving gangster Gyp Rosetti - while cracks begin to appear in his marriage after Margaret makes a major decision. Van Alden heads for Illinois as he tries to escape the clutches of the FBI, and Al Capone is infuriated by an Irish mobster. Drama set in Prohibition-era Atlantic City, starring Steve Buscemi, Kelly Macdonald and Stephen Graham, with Bobby Cannavale (Nurse Jackie)

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Eli is released from prison and returns to Atlantic City, but discovers much has changed during his time inside - including his status within Nuckys organisation. Gyp Rosetti decides to make his mark on the liquor trade, Margaret tries to deal with what she saw at the hospital, and Chalky thinks his daughter Maybelle may have found a suitable husband. Meanwhile, Nucky tries to investigate some of his political rivals

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: The detectives try to solve the murder of a girl killed in a similar style to Adena Watson. Frank demands to work on the case alone but Bayliss becomes obsessed with his theory that the two crimes are related. Richard Belzer stars

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Lewis and Kellerman investigate a murder in a motel where all the guests are possible suspects. Police drama, starring Reed Diamond, Clark Johnson, Daniel Baldwin, Ned Beatty and Richard Belzer

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The militant arm of the Faith of the Seven grows more aggressive, Jaime and Bronn head south and Ellaria and the Sand Snakes vow vengeance

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon enlists the help of an unexpected ally, Daenerys makes a difficult decision in Mereen, Brienne searches for Sansa, and Theon remains under Ramsays control

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: In the midst of preparing for a key operation, Tom questions the loyalty of the members of his task force, while Robbie and Cliff plan for their meeting at the park. Perry searches for answers within the gang and uncovers a shocking truth and Maeve casts doubt on Robbies exit plan

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: At Kendalls lavish birthday bash, Shiv and Roman try to arrange a meeting with Lukas Matsson, a tech mogul who recently snubbed Logan

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Silvio and Ralph try to ensure the Columbus Day parade takes place without any problems, Father Phil hosts an Italian Pride ladies lunch, and Bobbys wife Karen is involved in a car accident. Meanwhile, Tony reflects on the importance of good role models. Starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Edie Falco

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The return of the gritty Italian mafia drama. With Ciro dead and Naples set for an all-out war, Genny turns to the Levante family for help. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Once balance in the city has been restored, Genny reinvents himself as a businessman, but finds it impossible to leave his violent past behind him. In Italian

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Arya continues her training at the House of Black and White, Jorah and Tyrion run into slavers and the Sand Snakes mount an attack. Fantasy, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon prepares for conflict, Sansa tries to talk to Theon, and Brienne waits for a sign. Elsewhere, Jaime attempts to reconnect with his family

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: To demonstrate a point, Paul tells Laura about events from his past, to help her understand the difference between reality and imagination

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard, the owners of Carlton Towers near Selby in North Yorkshire, prepare to host a fitness boot camp weekend at their property - while also welcoming an array of guests to celebrate their sons birthday. Meanwhile, Sir Benjamin Slade hopes a murder mystery weekend at Maunsel House in Somerset will help pay off a sizeable electricity bill

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Marcus Garan is a part of a group of hitmen who are contracted to take out a notorious killer, only to find out theyre being hunted. Writer/director Kevin Greviouxs action thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Alain Moussi, Marie Avgeropoulos and Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel
